com.sleepysim

Class Network_control

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sleepysim.Network_control

  • public class Network_control
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the framework of the simulator. It provides two buffers to save messages to be sent for honest and corrupted node separately. Both the honest node and the corrupted node will send and receive message from this class. They will not send and receive message directly from each other.
    Also, this class provide the function for the simulator to move into the next round.

    • Method Detail

      • next_round

        void next_round()
        This function is to move the simulator into the next round

      • send_message

        java.util.ArrayList<Message> send_message(java.lang.Integer target)
        This function is to send message to honest nodes. Both the message the corrupted nodes want to send in this round and the message that is overtime in the buffer.
        Parameters:
        target - - id of the honest node
        Returns:
        return the message which is sent to the honest nodes

      • send_message_to_corrupted

        java.util.ArrayList<Message_to_send> send_message_to_corrupted()
        This function is to send message to corrupted nodes. All the message received from the honest nodes will be sent to the corrupted nodes.
        Returns:
        return the message which is sent to the corrupted nodes

      • receive_message_from_honest

        void receive_message_from_honest(Message message,
                                 java.lang.Integer from,
                                 java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> target)
        This function receives message from honest nodes. The received message will be put into the corrupted node buffer and also the honest node buffer.
        Parameters:
        message - - message received
        from - - id of the honest node that send the message
        target - - id of the nodes to which the honest node wants to send the message.

      • receive_message_from_corrupted

        void receive_message_from_corrupted(Message_to_send message)
        This function receives message from corrupted nodes. The received message will be put into the honest node buffer.
        Parameters:
        message - - message received
